name: TURBO
description:
Part of the Kult Galery (Singapore) exhibition,  "Joystick & Rage Quits"
#singaporeartweek2022

About:

Turbo is a side-scrolling beat’em up video game, inspired by ‘Street of Rage’

'Street of Rage' is the first game that I played on Sega in the 90s. 
Growing up in Jakarta, Indonesia, where most of the country’s economy was very much centralized.

All of us love to spend our days watching television to watch the news, politics, religions, gossips, quizzes and cartoons. 
It's as if we're hypnotized by the television.

At the same time television centralized system can be a media propaganda to make a stereotype or even make people disunited for their freedom.
